DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to assess immunogenicity of a 3-dose versus 4-dose infant vaccination schedule including kinetics of immune response in the early phases of the series.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of 2 or 3 Doses of MenACWY Conjugate Vaccine in Healthy Infants and the Effects of a Booster Dose of MenACWY Administered in the Second Year of Life
DOC.criteria: Infants of both genders who are in generally good health will be eligible for this study. For infants to be enrolled, the parents/legal representatives need to provide written informed consent and to be available for all study visits. Serious, acute, or chronic illnesses are reasons for exclusion.
